keyPolicies.policyDescription: Labour will recruit 20,000 more nurses. FACT: Over half of nurses now say that the ward is dangerously understaffed. The Tories have caused the worst A&E crisis on record.
Labour will recruit 8,000 more GPs and guarantee a GP appointment within 48 hours. FACT: One in four patients now waits a week or more to see a GP, or doesn't get a GP appointment at all.
Labour will guarantee cancer tests and results within one week. FACT: 20,000 patients waited longer than two months to start urgent cancer treatment in the last year.

None of Labour's plans require extra borrowing. FACT: Labour will fund these commitments through a mansion tax on properties over Â£2 million, a clamp-down on tax avoidance, and a levy on tobacco firms.

issues.health: NHS crisis, recruitment of more nurses, GPs, and guarantee of cancer tests and results within one week.

images.caption: Labour campaign leaflet with key policies on recruiting more NHS nurses and GPs, guaranteeing cancer test results within one week, and financial plans without extra borrowing.
